publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3222# Richard Lochhead: The Press and Journal's Oil Tax Campaign-That the Parliament welcomes the campaign by The Press and Journal against the 10% tax imposed by Her Majesty's Government on oil and gas profits; agrees that the tax and the way in which it was introduced pose a threat to jobs throughout Scotland, especially in the north east, as well as to the considerable efforts that were underway to prolong the life of the North Sea province, and believes that the campaign deserves cross-party support and the express support of the Scottish Executive. Supported by: Colin Campbell*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Irene McGugan*

S1M-3222# The Press and Journal's Oil Tax Campaign (lodged on 17 June 2002) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Stewart Stevenson*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Bruce Crawford*, Michael Matheson*, Brian Adam*, Mr David Davidson*
S1M-3222# The Press and Journal's Oil Tax Campaign (lodged on 17 June 2002) Shona Robison*, Phil Gallie*, Alex Johnstone*

S1M-3222# Richard Lochhead: The Press and Journal's Oil Tax Campaign-That the Parliament welcomes the campaign by The Press and Journal against the 10% tax imposed by Her Majesty's Government on oil and gas profits; agrees that the tax and the way in which it was introduced pose a threat to jobs throughout Scotland, especially in the north east, as well as to the considerable efforts that were underway to prolong the life of the North Sea province, and believes that the campaign deserves cross-party support and the express support of the Scottish Executive. Supported by: Colin Campbell, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Irene McGugan, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Stewart Stevenson, Roseanna Cunningham, Bruce Crawford, Michael Matheson, Brian Adam, Mr David Davidson, Shona Robison, Phil Gallie, Alex Johnstone
S1M-3222# The Press and Journal's Oil Tax Campaign (lodged on 17 June 2002) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-3222# The Press and Journal's Oil Tax Campaign (lodged on 17 June 2002) Kay Ullrich*, Nora Radcliffe*, Michael Russell*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3222# The Press and Journal's Oil Tax Campaign (lodged on 17 June 2002) Tricia Marwick*
S1M-3222# The Press and Journal's Oil Tax Campaign (lodged on 17 June 2002) Mr Mike Rumbles*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-3222# The Press and Journal's Oil Tax Campaign (lodged on 17 June 2002) Mary Scanlon*
S1M-3222# The Press and Journal's Oil Tax Campaign (lodged on 17 June 2002) Donald Gorrie*
